name: Technology Unions
text: +$1 for most devs in your tableau (ties go to no one)

name: Galactic Recycling
text: '+$1 after completing each development, not including this one

name: Public Works
text: +$1 after completeing each development (other than this one)

name: Galactic Investors
text: +$2 at the end of this phase, including the phase in which you complete this

name: Investment Credits
text: All developments (after this one) require one fewer developer to complete (but not fewer than one)

name: Galactic Federation
text: When completing each development (after this one), put 1 or 2 of the developers  used into your cup instead of your Citizenry
end_game_text: Add 1/3 of your total base development cost (rounded up)

name: Alien Research Ship
text: Act as if you have an extra Home explorer and Alien Technology explorer for this phase

name: Major Research Labs
text: Act as if you have an extra Home explorer for use this phase

name: Alien Research Team
text: Draw and keep an extra tile at the end of this phase, If you acouted with at least 1 Alien Technology explorer +$1

name: Advanced Logistics
text: You may rearrange all tiles in your construction zone (including turning them over)

name: Mining League
text: +$1 for each good on a Rare Elements world at the end of this phase
end_game_text: +2 VP per Rare Elements world in your tableau

name: Space Tourism
text: +$1, if you have the highest-cost world across all tableaus +$1 extra

name: Merchant Guild
text: +$2 at the end of this phase

name: Galactic Reserves
text: Each of your worlds can hold an extra good (each good still requires 1 shipper)
end_game_text: +1 VP per good (at then end of the game)

name: Galactic Salon
text: Gain 1 VP

name: Robot Surveyors
text: +$2 at the end of this phase

name: Terraforming Robots
text: $1 after completing any world, If completing a Rare Elements world +$1 extra

name: Replicant Robots
text: All worlds require 1 fewer settlers to complete (but not fewer than 1)

name: Alien Uplift Blueprints
text: Genes and Alien Technology worlds reuqire 1 fewer settlers to complete

name: Free Trade Zone
text: grey worlds require 2 fewer settlers to complete (but no fewer than 2)

name: Galactic Exchange
text: when completing each world, put 1 or 2 settlers used into your cup instead of your Citizenry
end_game_text: +1 VP for each different color of dice you own

name: New Galactic Order
text: When completing each world, put all of the Military settlers used into your cupt instead of your Citizenry
end_game_text: +2 VP per 3 Military dice you own (rounded up)

name: Export Duties
text: +$1 for each good you Trade this phase

name: Jumpdrive Research
text: +$1 for each good you Trade this turn from a Rare Elements world

name: Space Refineries
text: +$1 VP for each good you Consume from a Rare Elements world this phase

name: Free Trade Association
text: +$2 at the end of this phase
end_game_text: Add half of your total Novelty world cost (rounded up)

name: Galactic Demand
text: +$2 for each good you Trade this turn from a Novelty world

name: Minor Research Labs
text: +1 VP for each good you Consume from a Genes or Alien Technology world this phase

name: Galactic Renaissance
text: +1 VP for each good you Consume this phase

name: New Economy
text: +2$ for each good you Consume this phase
end_game_text: +1 VP per development without a Reassign power (including this one)

name: Organic Shipyards
text: Act as if you have an extra home shipper and an extra Genes shipper for use this phase

name: Space Docks
text: Act as if you have one more home shipper for use this phase

name: Galactic Bankers
text: Each time you Trade a good this phase, you may spend $1 to gain 1 VP chip
end_game_text: +1 VP per development in your tableau

name: Trade Levies
text: +$1 for each good you Consume this phase

name: System Diversification
end_game_text: Add half of your total base Reassign-power development cost (rounded up)

name: Mad Scientists
reassign: 2 if most Novelty worlds, 1 if tied
